method: Calculate energy required to break bonds (endothermic, positive): 4 C-H bonds at 413 kJ mol-1 each = 4 × 413 = 1652 kJ mol-1; 2 O=O bonds at 498 kJ mol-1 each = 2 × 498 = 996 kJ mol-1. Total bonds broken = 1652 + 996 = 2648 kJ mol-1. Calculate energy released forming bonds (exothermic, positive value for calculation): 2 C=O bonds at 805 kJ mol-1 each = 2 × 805 = 1610 kJ mol-1; 4 O-H bonds at 463 kJ mol-1 each = 4 × 463 = 1852 kJ mol-1. Total bonds formed = 1610 + 1852 = 3462 kJ mol-1. DeltaH = bonds broken - bonds formed = 2648 - 3462 = -814 kJ mol-1.
